summary: An anthology of four horror stories revolving around a mysterious rental house in the U.K.
cast: Denholm Elliott|Peter Cushing|Joanna Dunham|Tom Adams|Robert Lang|Joss Ackland|Wolfe Morris|Christopher Lee|Nyree Dawn Porter|Geoffrey Bayldon|Chloe Franks|John Bennett|Jon Pertwee|John Bryans|Ingrid Pitt|John Malcolm|Ann Barrass|Roy Beck|Richard Coe|Roy Evans|Carleton Hobbs|Bernard Hopkins|Joanna Lumley|Jonathan Lynn|Hugh Manning|Winifred Sabine
title: La mansión de los crímenes
